title: Bonanza: Day of Reckoning (1960) Full Western TV episode

sources.title: Bonanza: Day of Reckoning (1960) Full Western TV episode
sources.description:
A bigoted and racist farmer (Karl Swenson) takes action when Ben gives an Indian a piece of land as a reward for saving his life. Ricardo Montalban and Madlyn Rhue guest star..
 
Director: Richard Bartlett
Writers: Laurence Heath , R. Hamer Norris 
Stars: Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker
Genres: Classics, Cult, TV, Western
